name: A Game with a Kitty 1
description:
This is and oldschool platformer designed to play like older SNES/SEGA games. It's mostly about collecting money and getting new moves to progress. The game features a world map, saveable progress, talking NPCs, a few bosses and a bunch of hidden areas. Getting the best ending might take a while!

This is my first game release ever. It was made in two weeks, so it's rather short. I didn't know how to do stuff back in 2005, so the game controls are not customizable.

The music was made by the awesome Sean Cameron (aka Rudy Fox).
